--- title: "Download Positron" params: version: "2025.01.0-159" --- Find out what you need to know to [get started](start.qmd) using Positron, then download the installer for your platform. Please review [Positron's license agreement](licensing.qmd) and [privacy policy](https://posit.co/about/privacy-policy/). Your acceptance of this license agreement and privacy policy is required as a condition to proceeding with your download or use of the software. ::: {.cell .plain} ::: {.cell-output-display} |Platform |Download |Size | |:-----------------------------------------|:------------------------------------|:----| |Windows 10, 11 x64 (system level install) |[Positron-2025.01.0-159-Setup.exe](https://cdn.posit.co/positron/prereleases/win/x86_64/Positron-2025.01.0-159-Setup.exe)|224M | |Windows 10, 11 x64 (user level install) |[Positron-2025.01.0-159-UserSetup.exe](https://cdn.posit.co/positron/prereleases/win/x86_64/Positron-2025.01.0-159-UserSetup.exe)|224M | |MacOS 10.15+ (universal) |[Positron-2025.01.0-159.dmg](https://cdn.posit.co/positron/prereleases/mac/universal/Positron-2025.01.0-159.dmg)|646M | |Debian-based Linux (Ubuntu 22+) |[Positron-2025.01.0-159.deb](https://cdn.posit.co/positron/prereleases/deb/x86_64/Positron-2025.01.0-159.deb)|228M | |Red Hat-based Linux (RHEL9) |[Positron-2025.01.0-159.rpm](https://cdn.posit.co/positron/prereleases/rpm/x86_64/Positron-2025.01.0-159.rpm)|330M | ::: :::
